name: First Name or Last Name (First Letter: Capital, allows one ' and
description: This string is deisgned for only first names (or last). It requires the first letter to be capital but can be easily changed and allows and ' for names such as D'Angelo and one - for names such as D'Angelo-Maximus.It does not allow more than one - or ' or ' after the first letter. - also must be followed by a character
author: James Kung
